scripts.install:all: npm run install:cdk-stacks && npm run install:lambdas
scripts.cdk:deploy:base: npm run cdk:remove:context && cdk deploy EngagementDBBackend --exclusively --disable-rollback -c application_version=$npm_package_version
scripts.cdk:deploy:quicksight: npm run cdk:remove:context && cdk deploy QuicksightStack --exclusively --disable-rollback -c application_version=$npm_package_version
scripts.cdk:deploy:gitbash:base: npm run cdk:remove:context && winpty cdk.cmd deploy EngagementDBBackend --exclusively  --disable-rollback -c application_version=$npm_package_version
scripts.cdk:deploy:gitbash:quicksight: npm run cdk:remove:context && winpty cdk.cmd deploy QuicksightStack --exclusively --disable-rollback -c application_version=$npm_package_version
